alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 12:43AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bradford, northwestern Alachua, Union and southern Columbia Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort White, or near Ichetucknee Spring, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Columbia, Fort White, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence and Beasley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
